column30: Your cat somehow ended up in an epic local cat fight, ending with some pretty serious injuries and expensive vet bills. Things could have been a lot worse, you should see the other guy.
A post you recently made unexpectedly went viral. With all the notoriety, you decide to funnel all the attention to raise awarenss for persons with disabilities, causing a great social good.
A recent change by the social media company completely restructured your content. All your posts and friends got messed up, resulting in you losing half of all your social connections.
Recent conflict among the apposing political party has resulted in a sudden spike of interest and membership to your party.
A newly elected political leader has unilaterally re-embursed all student debt and costs of schooling, and will provide supportive funding to all active students.
Due to unforeseen changes in government policies or university funding, your financial aid is drastically reduced, making it challenging to afford tuition and living expenses.
The company undergoes a restructuring, leading to a massive layoff, and you find yourself unexpectedly unemployed.
Unexpectedly, a higher position becomes available, and you are chosen for a promotion, bringing new challenges and increased responsibilities.
The company you work for gets acquired by a larger, more successful corporation, leading to improved job security, better benefits, and expanded career opportunities.
The company faces financial difficulties, ultimately declaring bankruptcy, leaving you without a job and potentially losing promised benefits.
While scavaging through dumpsters looking for food, you came across an unscratched lottery ticket. Turns out it was your lucky day. You'll be eating well tonight.
Not that there was much to take, But you suffered quite a beating.

column1: ((increase in funding, new jail cell, improvement of overall conditions))
((prison riot, resulting in a "death toll", depression, escelated feers, and lack of insitutional trust, and suspicion of prisioneers))

column2: An sudden and unexpected virial campaign caused a raise of awarenss for individuals suffering from disabilities.

column32: When booking a vacation, you'll be taken to a screen where you can choose what vacation to take. Prices vary, and will provide different stat refreshes. Depending on the vacation, you might either take a flight or take a bus, which will unlock a "Board a Bus" or "Board a Flight" option

column1: Do a Good Deed for the Neighbor

column30: An easy way to boost your happiness. You might even get lucky and learn a thing or two.
By attending a class at the local library, you'll get a boost to one of your attributes. Best of all, it's free!
If you are enrolled in university
